title: How to stop google pixel 3 from randomly playing music when no apps are open?
content: Anytime I ask the assistant a question or have her do something Disney music starts playing on my phone. No music apps are open, sometimes no apps, and the only way to get it to stop is restarting my phone or playing different music. As much as I like Disney music, I do not want to have it played randomly.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
